files.description: One-command build runner CLI that sequentially executes artifact gate, taxonomy validation, and the toy meta-analysis demo, writing all logs/outputs into _build/ and failing fast on any error.
Step implementations and helpers for invoking the artifact gate, taxonomy validation, and meta-analysis demo as subprocesses with consistent logging, output capture, and _build/ directory management.
Structured logging and output-capture utilities that tee subprocess stdout/stderr to both console and _build/ log files with timestamps and step prefixes.
Path and filesystem utilities to create, clean, and resolve project-relative build output locations under _build/ in a cross-platform manner.
Documentation for running the one-command build runner, including expected prerequisites, command examples, outputs in _build/, and troubleshooting.

missionDescription: Create an automated 'one-command' build runner that sequentially executes: artifact gate, taxonomy validation, and the toy meta-analysis demo; ensure it writes all logs/outputs into _build/ and fails fast on errors.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
Current state has components but no integrated execution pathway; automation is required to prevent repeated '0 execution results' regressions and to make QA reproducible.
projectName: an automated 'one-command' build runner that sequentially executes: artifact gate, taxonomy validation, and the toy meta-analysis demo; ensure it writes all logs/outputs into _build/ and fails fast on errors.
